outputs.output_descr:
The Project was a part of the support to Country HIV and AIDS response in the sixth country programme. 
Key focus areas areas and results are: 
HIV/AIDS mainstreamed into National/State Economic Dev Strategy; capacity of national institutions to implement HIV/AIDS enhanced;  care and support for People Living with HIV enhanced
Key outcomes are Institutional capacity built to plan, implement and manage multisectoral strategies at both national and subnational levels to limit the spread of HIV and AIDS
Effective Communication Strategies developed for appropriate IEC to address the issue of behaviour change for Prevention of new infections

project_descr: HIV/AIDS mainstreamed into National/State Economic Dev Strategy; capacity of national institutions to implement HIV/AIDS enhanced;  care and support for People Living with HIV enhanced
